message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. It's a fantastic opportunity and I think you'll find it's a great value. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, $15000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm interested in your product but I'm only able to go up to $8000 right now.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your interest!  I understand that $8000 is your budget, but I'm not able to go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $12000, which I think is a fair price for both of us.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $12000, but I'm still a bit too high for my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $9500.  If we can meet in the middle, I think we can make a deal.
